Oven with a twist: Design an oven that can transform into a pizza oven, a roast oven, and a bread oven with just a simple button press. This oven would cater to different cooking needs and preferences, making it a versatile and convenient kitchen appliance.

Smart Oven: Create an oven that can adjust cooking time and temperature based on the type of food being cooked. This oven would use AI technology to learn the user's cooking habits and preferences, ensuring that their food is cooked to perfection every time.

Oven with a built-in grill: Design an oven that has a built-in grill, allowing users to cook a variety of dishes, including pizzas, steaks, and vegetables, all in one appliance. This oven would be perfect for those who want to save time and space in their kitchen.

Oven with a retractable rack: Create an oven with a retractable rack that can be extended or retracted as needed. This feature would provide more space for larger dishes or for cooking multiple items at once, while also saving space when not in use.

Oven with a built-in slow cooker: Design an oven that has a built-in slow cooker, allowing users to cook a variety of dishes, including soups, stews, and roasts, all in one appliance. This oven would be perfect for those who want to cook meals that simmer for hours without having to use a separate slow cooker.
